items.sentence: The store where Tom was working recently closed.
The teacher taught them that the earth is round.
The thought that Tom might do that worried Mary.
Tom is probably America\'s most talented artist.
I usually eat a big breakfast and a light lunch.
I want Tom and Mary to say that they were wrong.
I want life to go back to the way it was before.
I want my children to graduate from high school.
It was raining on and off all through the night.
It was so cold that no one wanted to go outside.
Have you ever eaten anything that Tom\'s cooked?
I wouldn\'t be calling if it weren\'t important.
Everybody knew that Tom could speak French well.
Everybody looks surprised and a little confused.
Everyone in the room was snoring except for Tom.
Everyone was really impressed with that machine.
What\'s your opinion with regard to this matter?
When Tom left, I told him he\'d be back someday.
Mary\'s not pretty, but she isn\'t ugly, either.
I suppose you want me to tell Tom what happened.
